sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPRIT, a ſmall boom or pole which crosſes the sail of a boat diagonally, from the mast to the upper hindmoſt corner of the ſail, which it is uſed to extend and elevate ; the lower end of the ſprit reſts in a fort of wreath or collar called the s mοtter, which encircles the mast in that place.
